title: Create Foreign Property Income & Expenditure Period
description: This endpoint allows the developer to submit the income and expenditure for a foreign property business that occurred between two dates. This submission is for either or both of Furnished Holiday Lettings (FHL) in the European Economic Area (EEA) and all other foreign Property submissions. A National Insurance number and business ID are required.

fromDate.description: The first day that the income and expenditure period summary covers.

toDate.description: The last day that the income and expenditure period summary covers.

foreignFhlEea.description: Object holding the income and expenditure of the user's Furnished Holiday Lettings (FHL) in the European Economic Area (EEA) for the period

income.description: Object holding the income details for the period.

rentAmount.description: Total rent and other income from property.

taxDeducted.description: Tax taken off rental Income (applies to non-resident landlords only).

expenditure.description: Object holding the expenditure for the period.

consolidatedExpenses.description: The sum of all expenses for the specified period.

foreignProperty.description: Array holding the income and expenses of the user's foreign property business - excluding Furnished Holiday Lettings (FHL) in the European Economic Area (EEA) - for the period.

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name.

income.description: Object holding the income details for the period.

rentIncome.description: An object containing the amount taken in rent and any tax deducted.

rentAmount.description: The total amount of rental income.

taxDeducted.description: Tax already taken off from the rental income.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: A boolean indicating whether Foreign Tax Credit Relief (FTCR) has been claimed.

premiumOfLeaseGrant.description: Premiums received for the grant of a lease and other lump sums to possess a property.

otherPropertyIncome.description: Other income from property, such as rent charges and ground rents, income from letting others tip waste on your land, and income for the use of a caravan or houseboat at a fixed location.

foreignTaxTakenOff.description: The total amount of foreign tax taken off your income.

specialWithholdingTaxOrUKTaxPaid.description: Tax withheld (in UK Pounds) on certain payments to UK residents or UK Tax taken off rental Income (applies to non-resident landlords only).

expenditure.description: Object holding the expenditure for the period.

residentialFinancialCost.description: The residential financial cost that can be deductible from rental income (tax relief).

broughtFwdResidentialFinancialCost.description: Amount of relief brought forward for restricted residential financial costs.

consolidatedExpenses.description: The sum of all expenses for the specified period.
